title: Trombone Shorty- (2013) Say that to say this  Projeto Chernobyl
description:
Troy 'Trombone Shorty' Andrews' is a rare artist who can draw both the unqualified respect of jazz legends and deliver a high-energy rock show capable of mesmerizing international rock stars and audiences alike. With such an unprecedented mix of rock, funk, jazz, hip-hop and soul, he had to create his own name to describe his signature sound: Supafunkrock! This album finds him collaborating with famed producer Raphael Saadiq. Recorded in Los Angeles and his native New Orleans, the album includes nine new original tracks and collaboration with the original line-up of the Meters, recording together for the first time since they broke up in 1977 on a new version of their song, 'Be My Lady'. 

Tracklist: 

01 Say That To Say This 2:56
02 You And I (Outta This Place) 3:51 
03 Get The Picture	 2:43
04 Vieux Carre 2:45
05 Be My Lady 3:31 
06 Long Weekend 4:07 
07 Fire And Brimstone 3:26 
08 Sunrise 3:16 
09 Dream On 4:20 
10 Shortyville 4:22
